annonstext:
After a largely successful year in 2020, Our clients are looking for Crane operators to join their teams for Onshore Wind Farm projects across Europe. 

 

 Therefore we are looking for Mobile Crane operators, specifically with experience on LTM1750 and LTM1200. We also will require Operators with CC and LR experience over 300 tonnes. 

 

 Essential Duties and Responsibilities for this role include, but are not limited to, the following:

	Operating the crane as required by the client.
	Maintenance and General care of the crane
	Rigging and De-rigging as required by the client.

Requirements:

	Previous experience of operating the above cranes onshore, must provide a reference from the last 24 months.
	Crane License
	Medical Certificate 
	Passport
	Driving License
	GWO’s (not mandatory but preferred)
	ID06 

Please note: This position is only available for EU passport holders.

The candidate must have the rights to work in the location stated in the job advert.
annonstextFormaterad:
After a largely successful year in 2020, Our clients are looking for Crane operators to join their teams for Onshore Wind Farm projects across Europe.

Therefore we are looking for Mobile Crane operators, specifically with experience on LTM1750 and LTM1200. We also will require Operators with CC and LR experience over 300 tonnes.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities for this role include, but are not limited to, the following:

  • Operating the crane as required by the client.
  • Maintenance and General care of the crane
  • Rigging and De-rigging as required by the client.

Requirements:

  • Previous experience of operating the above cranes onshore, must provide a reference from the last 24 months.
  • Crane License
  • Medical Certificate
  • Passport
  • Driving License
  • GWO’s (not mandatory but preferred)
  • ID06

Please note: This position is only available for EU passport holders.

The candidate must have the rights to work in the location stated in the job advert.
